DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire 4 Total Years Have Smoked Cigarettes Year Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the total years they smoked cigarettes not including any time they may have stayed off cigarettes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Total Years Have Smoked Cigarettes
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about the total years an individual smoked or currently smokes cigarettes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about the total years an individual smoked or currently smokes cigarettes.

Concepts.definition: A question about the total years an individual smoked or currently smokes cigarettes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Division of Cancer Control and Population Sciences

ReferenceDocuments.name: How many total years have you
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many total years have you smoked (or did you smoke) cigarettes? Do not count any time you may have stayed off cigarettes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If you smoked less than one year, write "1".
ReferenceDocuments.description: If you smoked less than one year, write "1".

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
